Classes in navigators.smart.tom used by navigators.smart.communication
ServiceReplica
          This class implements a TOMReceiver, and also a replica for the server side of the application.
 

Classes in navigators.smart.tom used by navigators.smart.communication.server

          This class implements a TOMReceiver, and also a replica for the server side of the application.
 

Classes in navigators.smart.tom used by navigators.smart.tom
MessageContext
          This class represents the whole context of a request ordered in the system.
ReplicaContext
           
TOMReceiver
          This class is used to assemble a total order messaging layer
TOMRequestReceiver
          Interface meant for objects that receive requests from clients
TOMSender
          This class is used to multicast messages to replicas and receive replies.
